page.title: 06Wem Jubilee Band
page.content: Wem Jubilee Band started in 1978.It consists of 5 basses, 2 fugel horns, 2 euphoniums, 4 tenor horns, 7 trombones, 13 cornets, 3 baritones, 1 drummer, and 1 conductor. The band do lots of things like concerts, fetes, and jummble sales to raise money to buy new uniforms and instruments. The uniform consists of a black skirt, a pair of grey tights, a burgandy jacket with yellow trim, black shoes, a white blouse and a black bow tie. The band practise from 7.30 till 10.00 on a Friday night. The age group varies from 10 year olds to about 80 year olds. These are some of the things we play; Swinging Safari, Simoraine, Malvern Suite, Match Of The Day, Hey Mr. Music Man, Blaydon Races, The Grandfather Clock,I Dont Know How To Love Him, Choral And Rockout and many hymns.
